snippet: NerdWallet offers an online tool for comparing prepaid debit cards, based on information the user provides on how the card will be used.
abstract: NerdWallet offers an online tool for comparing prepaid debit cards, based on information the user provides on how the card will be used.
lead_paragraph: Prepaid debit cards are often promoted as an alternative to checking accounts. You put money on them each month and spend it down, using the card to finance purchases and pay bills.

headline.main: A New Prepaid Debit Card Comparison Tool
